sections.comments: Music background requiredRegistration in EDCP 210 will be manually done once Criminal Record Check clearances are received by the Faculty of Education. Intentions to register should be forwarded to music.advisor@ubc.ca before July 31, 2019 to allow time for CRC clearances.

description: Role of music education in schools and society, including historical, philosophical, psychological, and sociological perspectives. Includes guided class observations and practice music teaching in elementary and secondary schools. Criminal Record Check required.
